subject: Re: Flock Poles to Existing Poles
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

404 Media or whatever they are called is a joke. They have twisted so many stories to make us/PDs seem like the bad guys. The one going around now about the woman in Texas was 100% false. They were tracking this woman but only because she self administered an abortion and went into hiding out of fear. Her family was concerned for her health obviously and got a search going for her. When they found her with the help of Flock there were no charges of any kind filed. It was a missing person search. Not a PD tracking her down because of the abortion.

Would love to see what those people would think of Flock if something happened to them or a loved one and it was solved using Flock tech.
	
 
Matt Triana
Project Manager
 https://www.fox5atlanta.com/news/over-6m-stolen-electronics-recovered-massive-georgia-porch-pirate-operation?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 
 	 


On Fri, Jun 27, 2025 at 1:28?PM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	Thank you.  Hopefully after moving these and getting these last locations scheduled, we will be close to full install.  We haven�t (knock on wood) had any other camera damages.  We have been mapped out on deflock.me http://deflock.me/  so there�s that.

	 

	Derek

	 

	Detective D. DeWitt

	Financial Crimes Unit

	Special Weapons and Tactics Team

	Background Investigations Team

	Eugene Police Department

	300 County Club Road

	Eugene, OR 97401

	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

	Work Cell � 541-743-6192

	 

	From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
	Sent: Friday, June 27, 2025 1:24 PM
	To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
	Cc: Gaby Mahoney <gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com >; Zach Bondi <zach.bondi@flocksafety.com zach.bondi@flocksafety.com >; Colby Durden <colby.durden@flocksafety.com colby.durden@flocksafety.com >; Andrew Albright <andrew.albright@flocksafety.com andrew.albright@flocksafety.com >; Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com >
	Subject: Re: Flock Poles to Existing Poles

	 

	[EXTERNAL ?]

	Great! I will push those locations to scheduling. Bret's contact info will be included on the WOs and I will also keep tracking them in order to provide updates.



Matt Triana
Project Manager

		From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
		Sent: Friday, June 27, 2025 12:57 PM
		To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
		Cc: Gaby Mahoney <gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com >; Zach Bondi <zach.bondi@flocksafety.com zach.bondi@flocksafety.com >; Colby Durden <colby.durden@flocksafety.com colby.durden@flocksafety.com >; Andrew Albright <andrew.albright@flocksafety.com andrew.albright@flocksafety.com >; Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com >

		Deployment Plan https://planner.flocksafety.com/planning-portal/deployment-tracker/public/0f92e14e805f30bf6acf29115ee1c582af5a1869940435ece20c692c87318e3d8bff60a524a9c008df6363401da1a55f747c28c03abf27e27ef141544e494e70

		On Fri, Jun 27, 2025 at 11:21?AM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

			I have approved the majority of cameras.  Five of them will need to be moved for various reasons.  I have attached a word document that has photos and diagrams of where we want those cameras to go.  It should all be on COE equipment and not an issue.

			
			Derek

			 

			Detective D. DeWitt

			Financial Crimes Unit

			Special Weapons and Tactics Team

			Background Investigations Team

			Eugene Police Department

			300 County Club Road

			Eugene, OR 97401

			Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

			Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

			Work Cell � 541-743-6192

			 

			

			 

			From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
			Sent: Thursday, June 26, 2025 9:00 AM
			To: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >
			Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >; Gaby Mahoney <gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com >; Zach Bondi <zach.bondi@flocksafety.com zach.bondi@flocksafety.com >; Colby Durden <colby.durden@flocksafety.com colby.durden@flocksafety.com >; Andrew Albright <andrew.albright@flocksafety.com andrew.albright@flocksafety.com >; Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com >
			Subject: Re: Flock Poles to Existing Poles

			 

			[EXTERNAL ?]

			Hi Detective,

			 

			Happy Thursday. It has only been a couple days so apologies for bothering you so quickly. Just wanted to see if you had a chance to review the revised locations. Once you approve we can get moving on scheduling and will make sure Bret gets contacted by us or the tech prior to these installs getting underway.

			 

			Deployment Plan https://planner.flocksafety.com/planning-portal/deployment-tracker/public/0f92e14e805f30bf6acf29115ee1c5828290e3954aa92da3493f894b52c796dd43b0feb7358b298988299e13382842409582968e4e64ac5c8ea8605e6d9a8519 

			Relocation Deployment Plan https://planner.flocksafety.com/planning-portal/deployment-tracker/public/0f92e14e805f30bf6acf29115ee1c5827a3d3914f03be9b7494d6efd50b73e604b909a62099b300e73adf7479426385bf7a4afdc87abcba8b34364b4e4c25e17 

			 

			Please let me know if you have any questions.

			 

			Regards

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager

			On Tue, Jun 24, 2025 at 7:03?AM JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

				Matt,

				 

				Just let me know when you plan to start working on them.

				 

				Bret Jones

				Traffic Operations

				City of Eugene

				O:541-682-4908

				C:541-228-5722

				 

				From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
				Sent: Friday, June 20, 2025 2:07 PM
				To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
				Cc: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >; Gaby Mahoney <gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com >; Zach Bondi <zach.bondi@flocksafety.com zach.bondi@flocksafety.com >; Colby Durden <colby.durden@flocksafety.com colby.durden@flocksafety.com >; Andrew Albright <andrew.albright@flocksafety.com andrew.albright@flocksafety.com >; Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com >
				Subject: Re: Flock Poles to Existing Poles

				 

				[EXTERNAL ?]

				Detective DeWitt,,

				Happy Friday. We have updated your maps. Since we now have these relocations, we technically have two Eugene projects active so you have two different maps. Here is your Deployment Plan https://planner.flocksafety.com/planning-portal/deployment-tracker/public/0f92e14e805f30bf6acf29115ee1c5828290e3954aa92da3493f894b52c796dd43b0feb7358b298988299e13382842409582968e4e64ac5c8ea8605e6d9a8519  for the main project and here is your Relocation Deployment Plan https://planner.flocksafety.com/planning-portal/deployment-tracker/public/0f92e14e805f30bf6acf29115ee1c5827a3d3914f03be9b7494d6efd50b73e604b909a62099b300e73adf7479426385bf7a4afdc87abcba8b34364b4e4c25e17 .

				 

				Please review F008 on the main deployment plan and then all locations on your relocation deployment plan. We moved them to all of the poles that Bret suggested. Some of these locations will end up getting cross captures which can be good and can be a hindrance sometimes. Cross captures are great for getting vehicles going in both directions. However, sometimes plates can be mixed if two cars pass each other at just the right time.

				 

				Please review when you can and let me know your thoughts.

				 

				Bret,

				 

				If the Detective and his team are good with these locations, are we approved to get moving on scheduling the relocations

				 

				Regards

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager


 949-547-3560 <tel:949-547-3560>    flocksafety.com 

	
 https://www.foxbusiness.com/technology/safety-tech-company-launches-tool-help-law-enforcement-fight-human-trafficking?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	


				On Thu, Jun 12, 2025 at 12:30?PM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

					I will let you guys go through and determine the best locations based on where they were previously.  Like we have talked about, adjustments forward and back are okay, as long as we are still essentially capturing the same data.  If one has to be moved significantly, lets touch bases first, but otherwise you guys can decide the best locations.

					 

					Thank you Bret for you quick attention to this.

					 

					Derek

					 

					Detective D. DeWitt

					Financial Crimes Unit

					Special Weapons and Tactics Team

					Background Investigations Team

					Eugene Police Department

					300 County Club Road

					Eugene, OR 97401

					Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

					Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

					Work Cell � 541-743-6192

					 

					

					 

					From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
					Sent: Thursday, June 12, 2025 12:21 PM
					To: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >
					Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >; Gaby Mahoney <gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com >; Zach Bondi <zach.bondi@flocksafety.com zach.bondi@flocksafety.com >; Colby Durden <colby.durden@flocksafety.com colby.durden@flocksafety.com >; Andrew Albright <andrew.albright@flocksafety.com andrew.albright@flocksafety.com >; Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com >
					Subject: Re: Flock Poles to Existing Poles

					 

					[EXTERNAL ?]

					Thanks Bret!

					 

					Detective,

					 

					I am going to schedule a call between myself and our mapping team to go through these locations 1 by 1 and update them. Let me know if you want to be present for this. Don't think you need to be but want to give you the option.

					 

					Thanks!

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager


 949-547-3560 <tel:949-547-3560>    flocksafety.com

thread_messages.body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

					Thanks Bret!

					 

					Detective,
